content: crochet this bright and cheery shoulder bag that brims with nostalgia 15 daisy granny squares are seamed together in a clever way to form this beautiful bag the free pattern can be found *** here 1 *** note that the 10 page pdf contains the step-by-step pictures and detailed instructions on how to assemble the bag three different shades of 24/7 cotton are used in this design i used succulent 2 skeins ecru 1 skein and goldenrod 1 skein to see different color combinations and for inspiration for your own bag check out my blog post *** her 2 e*** as i worked up 22 different granny squares using various shades of 24/7 cotton yarn in my stash i have a full video tutorial on my blog and on youtube that demonstrates how to crochet each and every round of the daisy granny square i also demonstrate how to crochet over the yarn tails and weave in the ends too to instantly add zipper closure and compartments you can fit a small size bag organizer into this bag comes in different colors and patterns you can find the bag organizer link in my blog post 1 https //www allaboutami com/summer-days-daisy-bag/ 2 https //www allaboutami com/summer-days-daisy-bag/
